content.detailedDescription: I had gone to watch the lighting from storms to our south and east beforeheading to bed.  something to the west of the storms in the southern sky caughtmy eye.  it was red in color, and i thought it was mars at first, because i hadcaught something on the news about it being out.  however, i soon realized thiswas not the case.First, the lightning should have overcome the light from the object for a splitsecond.  it did not.Second, the sky was totally overcast.  no stars or other celestial bodies werevisibile.Third, the lightning illuminated the sky enough to clearly show that the objectwas below the cloud base.The two kickers really made me think it was a ufo1.  the object was usually a pretty steady red in terms of color and theintensity of its light.  however, on two occasions, after watching it for acouple minutes, its light dimmed to nothing for about two or three seconds, thenreturned to its original brightness.  after about five or six minutes, theobject dimmed to no light, and the light did not return.  the dimming and comingback of light was not in a regular pattern whatsoever.2.  the object did not move at all.  it appeared to just stay put in onelocation.  aircraft moves and has some sort of lights that blink or faderegularlythis most certainly did not.During the sighting, i became somewhat scared as noted in the survey above,mostly because i had never seen anything like it and quickly realized that itwasnt what i thought it originally was.  something so unfamiliar is unnerving. after the object disappeared i watched for about 30 more seconds, and it didntreturn, i went to bed, still feeling a bit frightened.  i did get a restfulnights sleep, however.If you wish to contact me, please use my email address, rather than my phonenumber.  thanks
content.summary: Red object spotted in southern sky - not mars
Black tubular boomerang shaped object with appenda

content.detailedDescription: I was with four other sailors standing watch at the naval air station injacksonville fl, in the year 1952 .I was the first one to see a light travelingat tremendous speed coming from jacksonville fl. direction. then the other threespoted it. it was traveling from n to s and stoped over the naval air station.There was no slowing down , just a sudden stop. the object hovered over thenaval air staion for about 15 seconds. it then either shot straight out or justdisappeared. i think it shot straight up or out. while it was hovering you couldsee a dark spearhead in front of a dim yellow light. i could indentify everyaircraft on the airstaion at that time and this was unlike any thing i had everseen. two navy phantom jets   the old vintage were scrambled at the same time ofthe appearance. there was a feeling that the base was being probed in the 15seconds it hovered. if i were to guess at the speed before a dead stop , i wouldsay it was traveling at least 6000 miles an hour. just a guess but the altitudewas about 10000 feet. i do not get excited over anything , which allowed me toobserve without emotions. i know now there is somethin beside us in thewonderful universe. i would not believe ufo reportsif i had not seen this with my own eyes. this incident was reported to thecontrol tower, their reply was that it was just a weather balloon .I am an old timer now and would like to take an interest in this kind ofresearch. are there any clubs or any thing i can join. my wife is deceased  andi have plenty of time on my hands. thank you
content.summary: Black spearhead object over jax air base in fl.  b

content.detailedDescription: i was walking my dog at about 1030 p.M. and looking at the stars while waiting  for my dog to do his business when i noticed a bright star-like object in the  nw sky that seemed like it was moving.  i watched for about twenty minutes  before taking my dog inside. it moved closer during that time. i got a pair of  binoculars and continued to watch from my back deck. i steadied the binoculars  by leaning against a deck pillar. the object was in the nw sky and looked  crescent shaped and indeed was moving in a random pattern with a trail of  rainbow colors. it moved extremely fast and with bizzare whips and turns,   very similar to a child with asparkle action.  it was probably more than  30,000 feet up as we live in a rural area on top of a mile high mountain in  western pa. it was higher than most of the airplane flight paths.  after i had  watched it for more than half an hour, i noticed another ufo in the northern  sky, lower than the first, more northly direction.  it was fainter, but with  deffinent movement and a round white shape. i couldnt tell if it was one small  ufo moving rapidly from right to left or a large ufo with pulsating white  lights along its center.  i observed both ufos together, but they didnt seem  to be communicating together. the one in the nw sky was moving about  erratically, while the one in the north sky seemed more stable a hovering. i  oberved them for a total of about 45 minutes.  i came in the house and went to  bed, hoping that whatever they were that they would stay aloft and away. the  next morning i didnt feel well for a few hours and i am very healthy and  rarely feel sick. i did feel better by the afternoon, but wondered if anything  had happened that i didnt remember.
content.summary: Two ufos in north sky

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in our car on our way home.  i was listening to my cd player and itstarted to skip.  our interior lights dimmed in the car so i took off myheadphones and the radio station had started to switch and be inaudible.  icaught a bright light out of the corner of my eye and i saw this red disc justhovering over the corn like a signal light, only it didnt move.  i was curiouswhen i first saw it, i knew it wasnt supposed to be there, and during the timethat i saw it, a calm came over my body.  i wanted to tell everyone else in thecar, but i couldnt open my mouth or take my eyes off of the disc.  i was alittle afraid to know what i wanted to say and not be able to say it, buticouldnt bring myself to say anything.  the craft didnt move, it was like a redorbe and it just hovered over the field.  i really didnt lose sight of theobject, it faded into the night.  i know it sounds cheesy, but it started tomove farther and farther out of the air until it just disappeared.  afterwards,i was afraid sometimes to sleep at night, it wasnt paranoia, but a feeling thati was being watched, which is why it took me so long to report this, but i needan answer.  i want to know that im not alone and i want the dreams i have to goaway.  please help me understand what i saw that night and why i couldnt sayanything to anyone else in the car.
content.summary: I cant believe what i saw

content.detailedDescription: Observed lights in sky that seem to come from on top of a cloud. at first ithought it was lighting, it was during a storm but the lights repeated apattern. it lasted for about three hours. there seemed to be four lights thatwould all merge together than they would move away from each other in a circleand come back to the center and the same pattern repeated over and over. thiswas caught on video.
content.summary: Pulsating lights in glendale, az sky during storm

content.detailedDescription: Ext_lightsflashed_sequentiallybackyard,plane,person,run,flew arond in circles,zoomed offext_lights_colorwhiteext_lights_colorgold_copper_bronzechange_colornoemissionflamesoundswish
content.summary: A ufo walks with us on  earth

content.detailedDescription: I,bud harper was sitting outside,in front yard when i noticed what i thought wasa falling star brighter than usual.The object seemed to be falling from right toleft at aprox.40 to 45 deg.As it fell i said to my wife look,look,and as sheturned to look the object seemed slow just a bit and make a noticible roundedturn to the right and proceeded to fall in e.S.E direction and at a less steepor flatter angle,aprox.12 to 15 deg.My wife didnt have time to see it.By thetime i told her to look 3 seconds had elapsed and it turned sped off was another2 seconds. it was only slightly overcast as i could see some of the brighteststars. addtionally  on 7-29-2003 at aprox. 2330 hours witness 2 and i were againsitting out front,and this time he says for me to look.As i turned i didnt seeanything. so he describes a very similar occurance as the night before,andwithin no more than 30 seconds he yells there it is again and i turn to see thelight speeding off to a n.E.Direction.This second sighting on the second nightby me was aprox.80 to 90 deg.To my left at aprox.1000 o-clock posistion.Aswitness 2 describes second sighting , he says object appeared to make a almostcomplete circle. we concurred that had the lightjudging by its size andbrightnessbeen regular aircraft weed have heard noise,and the speed we witnesseddidnt seem possible at all.
content.summary: East  san diego  county  night  sightings

content.detailedDescription: when i saw this ufo, i was house sitting for my pastors. at about 1000pm i went out side to have a smoke, as i was smokeing my cigarette i got a strange fealing and looked up over my shoulder and what i saw was incredible. the ufo was like nothing ive ever seen before. it was all black about 150 long, 30wide, and 2 to 3 stories high. it was about 100 to 150, above the ground and did not make a sound. the speed of the craft was about 30 to 40 mph at my best guess. when i 1st saw it i thought, how could it fly with no wings or tail section, it was a rectangle. finallythe ufo slowley moved accross the sky until i could see it no more.                          thank you joe.
content.summary: Ufo saw close up

content.detailedDescription: I was about 14 years old and i remember it was a sunday afternoon - i dontremember the exact month but i guess it was january or february because it wascold out, but it was a beautiful sunny day - not a cloud in the sky.  i wassitting on my bedroom windowsill on the ground floor of an apartment buildingand was just basically just sitting looking out the window toward woods whichlead down to the hudson river and across from that the palisades are visible. soi was across the street from the woods. all of a sudden i saw an object appearin the distance...At first i thought it was a kite because it had the same shapefrom far away, and the strange thing was that from the moment i saw it, eventhough it was relatively far away, i felt like everything was moving in slowmotion - kind of like when you are in a dream and are being chased but findyourself unable to run...It was a strange feeling...As the object got closerwhich it did rapidly i saw it as clear as day above the building across thestreet - it was huge and white and diamond-shaped and had a large red insigniaof a bird on it - the birds head was turned to the left and the wings werefacing down.  there was no detailing on the insignia at all, it was just in thesilhouette of a bird.  as soon as it disappeared from my view because it movedpast my line of vision from the window i snapped out of it and was startled tosay the least although surprisingly i was not scared at all, just excited.  iran into the living where my parents were having guests over and announced muchto their dismay i had seen a ufo which of course no one believed...And it wasstrange because i remembered everything with crystal clarity after it happenedbut as the day went on the memory faded, like when you wake up from a dream andyou remember it perfectly but later on the memory is clouded.  my first thoughtwas to dismiss it as a hallucination, but a few months later i saw an article inthe national enquirer,of all places, i believe, about a couple in indiana whohad seen the exact same thing - they even drew it, which scared the hell out ofme because there was no mistakign what i had seen.  so if people hundreds ofmiles away had seen it too i knew i wasnt crazy.  not long after, my family wasdriving to chicago to visit relatives.  we were on a stretch of route 80 inpennsylvania at about 330 am when my sister and i were awakened by my parentsshouting...It seems a saucer shaped craft had been hovering in front of t
content.summary: Saw kite-shaped shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: 1.  sitting at mozingo lake star gazing and talking.2.  witness 3 made a comment that what looked like a star directly above usappeared to be rotating in small circles.3.  a star that was shimmering due to heat waves comming off of the earth.4.  during the sighting i was personally excited and scared at the same time.The other two witnesses were both alarmed  upset during the sighting and begancrying.  we immediately left the area after the sighting and went home.5.  all three witnesses watched the star for approx. 5 min. and all agreed thatit was just a star, however, it did appear to be rotating in very small circles. we all agreed that it was due to heat waves.  the conversations then went backto what ever we were talking about and just looking at the stars.  approx.5minutes later witness 3 again made the comment that the star was moving in smallcircles.  all three witnesses then moved to the back of the car and beganwatcing the star.  we all watched the star for approx 1-2 min. and agreed thatit was possibly moving in small circles.  the star then began to move in astraight line across the sky, in a se direction, much like a satalite forapproximatly 5 sec.  all three witnesses saw this and made various comments,like are you seeing this.  witness 2 became very alarmed.    the star thenstopped, very briefly less then 5 sec. and took off again at approximately a 35degree  angle, at the same speed traveling in a westerly direction. after 3-5sec. the star again stopped and changed dirctions this time heading in a nedirection.6. this time we observed the star move and begin to accelerate, actually leavingtail like a shooting star.  the object accelerated off the horizon and acctuallyappeared to go at a upward direction.  i cant even imagin how fast it was movingwhen it took off.
content.summary: Moving star changes directions3 times and shoots o

content.detailedDescription: I had been on a trip visiting my elderly mother in jacksonville, north carolina. i was now on the return trip back to my home in chesapeake, va.  it was in theafternoon, and i was driving between richlands and kinston n.C., northbound, atabout 50 mph.  the area was rural farmlands, with a 30 to 50 ft. treeline oneither side of the main asphalt roadway.  occassionally. i passed farms and openfields on either side of the road.  the road also rose and dipped in the shallowhills in this area.  i was looking down the road, straight ahead, when a silveryobject came from behind the treeline to my right and flew straight across theroad, about 100 to 150 ft. above it.  the object was cigar-shaped, with a bulletshaped point on the front.  the back top 13 of it was shaped like a long fin,although it had no moving parts on it.  i got the impression this area couldhave been a crew area, or possibly for propulsion, although there was none.  itwas smooth, silvery, with no markings, no windows, or other external metalfittings or marks.  it did not make any noise, and did not exhibit any externalpropulsion no exhaust, no propellers.  i have never seen anything like thisbefore or since....It was simply amazing  i did not have the sense that it wasanything produced by man.  it dissappeared behind the treeline to my right.  itried to speed up and see if i could get to an open field which might give me abetter sight line on the object, but there were only trees ahead on my left andi never saw it again.  i have no idea what it was.  i estimate its size at 50ft. in length, and very aerodynamic in shape.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo in north carolina

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back deck having a smoke and noticing lights moving north.  ithought it was a satellite until it zigzagged.  and there wasnt a sound at all. i have been noticing these events for almost 2 weeks.
content.summary: Lights moving north

content.detailedDescription: i tried to report this already, but i filled out a long summary and tried     to submit to 2 different places and it didnt work.  i got pissed off and     decided no one would get to know.  then i read an article today about mufon     so i figured i would try one more time.I went out to smoke a cigarette at my parents house.  i looked up over the roofand there were orange streaks going across the sky.  i was immediately in shockbecause this was just unbelievable.  i never imagined it would happen to me.  sothese lights which are hard to describe were orange and looked pretty much likemeteors.  but they werent because i saw like 100 in 1 minute or two.  they weregoing in all directions, very fast.  the trails looked almost like a tracer. they were going so fast i could not focus on them.  they were all the same sizeand shape.  as i said they looked like orange shooting stars going in alldifferent directions kind of like a spider web but not quite.As i said ive written this before and i dont even know if it will work this timeso im not writing as much.  this is nothing that can be explained if i coulddraw it i would.Any way i stood in shock for about what seemed five minutes and ran in and gotthe phone.  i called my sister because she would probably be up.  she was but idont remeber what we discussed i think it went like mei see ufos herwow.  theywere still going so i decided to run in and wake up whomever was going to comedown the fastest.  my dad did and i said come fast.  he kinda did, but when wegot out there there was nothing.  then a white light went from the bottom to thetop of the viewing area.  then another.  i asked him if he saw it he said yes,but after talking to him im not so sure.  he said they were birds.  but he didntsee the orange light show so i would have to disagree.I probably forgot a bunch but i still remember quite vividly what happened.The next night i went out to look again.  saw some strange things but they couldhave been bats or something.  but one thing stood out.  there was a light besidea star, but i had been staring at the sky and i couldnt remember that star.  itappeared to be sitting still by the way there was lightning that night then as iwatched it it moved slowly and then faded very quickly as it sped off.  i couldhave been mistaken on this one.  it could have been a
content.summary: Shock and awe

content.detailedDescription: Im not sure what this was, but it was the most beautifully colored object iveever seen in the sky. i dont know much about astronomy, but perhaps it was ameteor or comet. i know for sure it wasnt a shooting star though. it was a lotslower, and brighter. and it wasnt even fully dark out yet. if there is ascientific explanation for this, please let me know. thanks
content.summary: Shooting star looking object spoted at dusk

content.detailedDescription: I was looking towards the southeast. when out of the corner of my eye i sawsomething. it was gray circle it was moving  northwest. it  move behind abuilding.. i try to find it again but could not . a minute and a half later isaw two lights close together coming from the same direction going towards thediction of the first object. there was no noise from any of the objects. itfairly clear.
content.summary: Gray circle followed by two small lights.

content.detailedDescription: I couldnt sleep and could hear neighbours arguing. i looked out of my bedroomwindow and saw this bright light which initially looked like a big bright star.I then realised it appeared to have a smaller light either side of the mainlight. i studied it harder and thought it may have been a police helicopter,which sometimes hover, but there was no sound i could associate with itconsidering it was quite close. i went to get my binoculars and on closerinspection the lights either side of the main light could have been a glow frominside the object or of its engines. i could not make out a shape. the objectremained static, occasionally wobbling from side to side - as if there may havebeen turbulance. i observed it for approximately 1hr. 40mins.Except for a briefbreak to get a hot drink. i wanted to see if it would wait until dawn, which itdid. i noticed it had moved further west and appeared to have gained height, asif to remain subtly in the background as dawn broke. even with the lighter skyit was still difficult to make out what shape it may have been, but it didappear to have an auro the shape of a ball, though this may have just been thelights causing a distortion. it was noticable, the object had gained considerbleheight just before aeroplanes resumed their flight times. it moved more in thelast 20mins that i observed it, but the movement was so subtle it was hardlynoticable. it disappeared at 0448 hours. i remember thinking to myself, surelythe pilots could see it if i couldlastly, i should add, some days before thissighting i had seen the same object in the same part of the sky in the earlyhours of the morning and just dismissed it as a police helicopter, even thoughthere was no sound which i would have expected at that distance.
content.summary: Bright light, star like, with a smaller glow eithe

content.detailedDescription: Ufo encounter with missing timethis happened about 23 years ago on our way to hudson wisconsin from the eastside of st paul, i and a friend were travelling east on 94 from the east side ofst paul this trip normally takes 30 minutes max it was about 8.00 pm when weleft roccos resturant on the east side to go to hudson harbor resturant to pickup some supplies my friends dad, who owned both places. we were apporx 5 mileseast of st paul when i noticed a light hovering in the sky i said lets get acloser look so me and my freindhe was driving pulled off on a dirt road to thesouth approx 14 mile off the road and stopped we were right under the light itwas about 200-250 feet above the car and we sat there for a while when all of asudden it shot over the highway to the north and when it did this it was so fastthat all we could see was a light trial and then shot back over our car it didthis approx five times shooting around the sky leaving light trails and alwaysreturning back above our car we both just sat there amazed at what was happeningwe could not beleive it.We sat there for approx 10-15 min observing this strangelight in the sky then it shot out and became five lights if you pictured a staron the american flag with its five points there  was a light at every point ifyou can picture this with the car in the center. then all of a sudden it becameon light and shot straight up as fast as ever and was gone just leaving a trailof lights as it shot away. well we both decided to get out of there. and go tohudson and pick up our stuff. the strangest thing was yet to come when we gotthere we walked downstairs to the prep kitchen and it was 10.15 pm this was sowierd because this trip is 20-30 min max and we were on the side of the road 15-20 min max well we did not know what happened to the other time it was missing idonot remember anything more happening to us but there was for sure at least anhour of missing time. giving my self extra for how long ago it happened. i raninto my buddy about six months ao he does not remember anything about it. thisis extremly bizarre because i rememeber it all it makes me think i am a littlecrazy but i know what happened and this was for sure a true event
content.summary: Ufo with missing time

content.detailedDescription: I am a licensed light airplane pilot. i was standing in my driveway, my backpropped against my van on the night of may 15, 2003 watching the progress of thelunar eclipse through binoculars. a shape i at first thought had wings andflashing a row of extremely bright red, blue, green, and white lights across itsfront surface flew into my binoculars field of view. i had never seen anaircraft display the lights i saw on this thing.  i wanted to believe it was ahelicopter or airplane, both very common around here, but the thing was notlighted like the military aircraft that usually orbit hurlbert field, a usafinstallation with a north-south oriented runway about three miles to the west ofmy home.  aircraft display a green position light on the starboard wing tip, ared position light on the port wing tip and a white lamp on the tail.  sometimesthere are flashing red anti-collision lights on the upper and lower fuselagesurfaces.  sometimes the machine might display flashing blue-white xenon strobelights on the wing tips and tail, but this thing displayed an apparent row oftightly grouped, rectangular, multi-colored lights along its leading edge.  mostunusual.All the lights flashed on simultaneously in three quick pulses that repeatedafter about two beats. the object moved steadily from southeast to southwest atabout 50 to 75 miles an hour.It had passed below the moon, which was then in mid-eclipse, and i tracked itwith binoculars for about four to six seconds. then i watched it move alongwithout the glasses. at first i thought it was an airplane. it was low becauseit passed in front of me from left to right and then disappeared from viewbehind a nearby horizon of housetops and trees in the west.But the strangest thing about it was that it made absolutely no sound, none,nothing. not a hum, not a buzz, not a whine, roar or whistle, not anything. itwas perfectly silent.I judge it to have been traveling at a 15 to 20 degree slant from me and about12-mile distant at an altitude of 500 to 800 feet. as it passed, the coloredlights flashing on it were powerful enough to be reflected and diffused by themoisture in the air.  the light also dimly reflected off the pavement andhouses. it was very low.  it moved in a straight line and disappeared behindroof tops and trees in the west. it had one small, steady, white light showingon
content.summary: Flying police car or ufo

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was in my hot tub.2.I was looking at the stars.3.A meteorite4.I was happy i saw a ufo.5.It was a ball of light and it went across the sky.6.It went behind a house
content.summary: a small fast ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching the stars, lying on the hood of my dad92s car in the driveway.  i was talking to a friend on the phone at the time.  isaw a satellite traveling northward across the sky.  later, i thought i wasanother satellite.  this observation was reached by the luminosity of the objectand it rate and direction of its travel.  the object appeared as one bright,whiteyellow ball of light.  having lived under busy commercial air routes for myentire life, and being an amateur aircraft expert, i readily identified theobject as not being commercial air traffic.  the object was traveling in aneastern direction, coming from the west.  suddenly the object stopped.  itstarted to move again, but on a different course.  the object was soon almostdirectly overhead.   as the object was overhead, it rapidly flew in circles,zigzag patterns, and hovered.  during the aerobatics, i noticed that the objecthad a hazy halo surrounding it and it left a short, hazy trail behind it as itmaneuvered.  after a few minutes of said displays, the object started movingrapidly north.  suddenly reversing directions, the object began travelingsouthward.  it was at this time that i noticed the object was not one whitelight, but three distinct lights composing one object, or very tight formation. the lights were colored green, red, and white.  these are the colors used oncommercial aircraft, but the did not appear in the correct configuration to besuch an aircraft.  as the object sped southward toward the horizon, it stoppedbriefly.  at this time, the object split into three different white lights in atriangle formation.  as soon as the object had completed this transformation, itdisappeared at incredible speed to the southeast.  from the high altitude andspeed the object was traveling, i knew that it was not a helicopter orcommercial airplane.  by the aerobatics that i saw, i also knew that it was nota fighter jet, or either of the previously mentioned types of aircraft.  i amconfident in this conclusion because i have been an aviation enthusiast for mostof my life.  i have observed all type of aircraft, military and civilian.  ihave lived under major air routes for my entire life and i consider myself agifted aircraft spotter.
content.summary: Strange light display over suburban minnesota

content.detailedDescription: We were shooting skeet in the back of our trailer sales lot called "wh" east ofus 12 in coldwater, mi.  i was suprised to see over the fence, 1/4 mile away, atop like craft with legs.  it was off white and it was round like a top andnarrowed down like a funnel.  about 30 ft. wide.  it looked like it had 4 legsand it had lights, 1 on top and 3 lights i could see on the bottom.  i guess thelights drew my attention.I was so shocked and couldnt believe a real ufo.  i called my dad, andbrothers, and people also who were looking at a trailer and friends came tolook.  we watched it for 10-12 minutes.  all it did was hover above a tree.  mydad said he could see something moving around on the inside.  he was using asmall telescope.  i also noticed 3 u.S. air force planes circling for about 30minutes.  the ufo all at once disappeared.  we still cant believe what we saw,but we all know we saw a ufo.
content.summary: Toplike object with legs seen in coldwater, michig

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on the front deck stargazing, as this is our hobby on clearnights.  we look for satellites, the iss, shooting stars and etc. and arefamiliar with our night sky.On sunday evening, july 21st, 2003, we observed 3 different cellestialphenomenon that we could not readily explain.  the first was initiallystationary to the west, about 80 - 85 degrees above the horizon, and seemed tobe simply another star in the sky.  it started moving toward the southwest,getting dimmer, and dissapearing into the starlit sky, not to the horizon, mindyou, but seemingly into deeper space.A few minutes later, we noticed what i first thought was a satellite, movingfrom west to east at a rapid pace, traversing the sky from horizon to horizon inabout 45 seconds, and i would have disregarded it as such, but an aircraft withstrobes redgreen moved below it to give us a better reference, intersected thepath and obscured it for a brief moment...The altitude seemed to me to be toolow for a satellite but too high for an aircraft.  i spent 14 years of my navycareer as an aviator, and have a pretty good idea of what is normal behavior forairborne objects and what is not.  i believe the speed to have been much slowerthan a satellite but much faster than an aircraft.The third object hovered for a considerable period of time, in about the samearea of the sky as the first object, was visible for about 10 minutes, thensimply disappeared.I was intrigued by our observations, as we have spent many a night looking atthe stars, and havent seen anything at all like what we observed last night.  iwill continue to report as we observe other phenomenon.Note  we own 5 dogs, and they were all unusually disturbednervous during thetime we were viewing the objects.  it may have been the excited tone of ourvoices as we discussed what we were seeing.
content.summary: Bright lights stopping, moving again, high altitud

content.detailedDescription: 1 just got out of my pool in my back yard2 lights flying in the sky3 first thought it was just an airplan but then i was sure it was not a plan4 during the sighting i just watched the object, after the sighting i have foundit difficult to sleep.5 flew in a stright line north with flashing lights, then the ufo hovered andthen picked up speed and started to fly stright up into the air. the ufo thenstarted heading south. after heading south the ufo started heading north agiantowords the ground but then leved out in a striaght line heading north. the ufoout out a bright white light for about three seconds.6 flew behind some houses.
content.summary: St.Thomas ufo activity

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs at night.  i generally check out the sky, while they dotheir sniffing and i noticed a slow moving object that didnt seem plane shaped. as it came closer.  i could only see the lights - a triangle of 3 white with ared in the center.  it seemed quite high up and as it came overhead i heard ahum rather than a plane sound.  as it passed, a plane came into view flying kindof perpendicular to it but i think much lower.  unfortunately several cars camepast around that time so it became noisy and i couldnt hear it any longer.  itspossible its one of ours.  i just noticed it because the shape was unusual andit seemed to be doing more of what i would describe as a slow glide and then thehum, rather than a typical plane sound.
content.summary: Triangle in somerset, nj

content.detailedDescription: A big saucer shaped object belw up.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were headed east on iterstate 8 about 2 miles west of a rest area west ofelcentro ca. the object appeared approximately 400 yards ahead and to the northside of the freeway,at first it looked like a large plastic bag floating abovethe road but it was not moving in any direction, my girl freind said it lookedlike a news paper. as we got closer it began to move away from the highway norththen suddenly the color changed from a white and grey to solid black,and theshape changed to a prefect triangle,but i could make out what looked like roundpaterns like balls that made the triangle, like pool balls in a rack. the objectbegan to move north at a very fast speed,i could still see the triangle shapemove away like a zoom lens, then when it was about a quarter of mile away i sawit turn on its side so that the silhoutte looked almost flat then it began toaccelerate at a very high rate of speed going north north east,then went out ofsight.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting in our back yard. i was looking up at the skywatching the stars and looking for satelites. i was looking straight up in theair, when i saw a translucent triangle come over the view of the house. it wasodd looking, something i had never seen before. as i said, it was translucent,and it was moving in a straight linefrom south to north at a great speed maybe 4times as fast as any jet ive seen. when i say translucent, that is hard todescribe. it was glowing, and there were parts that were completely see through,and parts that seemed half there, and these areas moved and swirled.Maybe lookedsimilar to some sort of gasses flowing and glowing. as it moved it seemed as ifyou could see the air around it moving in this fashion also, but maybe at adifferent density. it was triangular shaped, but the corners were slightlyrounded not sharp corners. it seemed to glide using the two points of thetriangle almost as if they were wings of a bird gliding through the sky. and itdid glide quite gracefully. the third point of the triangle was in the back. theobject appeared to be about twice as big as a jet. when i saw this i tried totell my boyfriend, but was in such awe, that it took me a few seconds torespond. like my body tried to respond, but couldnt quite for a few seconds. ifinally pointed it out to my boyfriend who saw it clearly, but only for a fewseconds before it dissapeared. it was as if it just got out of sight. the wholething happened quite quickly, as the object was moving fast. i was in awe. mywhole body tingled with chills, and i began to cry.
content.summary: Translucent glowing flowing triangle that glided v

content.detailedDescription: This was my first sighting and it took place between 345-350 am july 17, 2003over rt. 70 in cherry hill nj in the sky above 3 executive campus.  i work thenight shift and had just finished eating a quick ramen meal.  i usually bring myown bowlutensils for my meal since theyre not provided at the work place.  afteri was done i brought the bowl out to my car and put it inside since i couldntfit it in with the other items in my bag. as i was leaving the car i just stoodtransfixed for a moment admiring the stars on a fairly clear night and thinkingof how massive and amazing the universe really is.  immediately after thinkingthat, i had a sudden instinct to look directly at a northeast area of the sky. at first i hadnt noticed much, but then a moment later i noticed what lookedlike a dim blueish star, moving across the sky at a slow speed. at first ithought it could be a plane maybe, but there were no flashing lights and thisobject had a steady blue glow, was very very high up, silent, and apeared to bedisguising itself to appear as a star. im not sure what gave the blueish glow,or if it was simly a reflection of moonlight off this object.  it was quitesmall in size from where i was standing, so i estimated it to be between 11-30feet, possibly larger and was possibly many miles into the atmosphere it lookedto be about the same size a small star appears  as i watched the object, itmoved across the sky about a hundred feet at a slow steady speed.  in my head atthat moment i thought to myself is this really a ufo im seeing  at the verymoment that thought came into my head the object stopped, then instantlypulsatedexpanded into a spherical ball of pure brilliant white light roughtly 20times the size it was before. it held that form for about 1 second, duringwhich, i heard myself say  whoaa it then returned to its previous color andshape small blueish star.  it continued to travel along at the same rate asbefore for about 3 seconds more, then accelerated to incredible speed in thesame direction and vanished into space
content.summary: Saw blue glowing craftwhite ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went to a concert in san diego and after we were driving backto the imperial valley. we were just listening to music and talking about theconcert and just being loud when all of a sudden we just stopped talking andthen i saw something in the air. at first i didnt know what to make of it. ididnt say anything about it until about 15 seconds later. i asked brian if hehad seen that and he said that he did. i wanted to stop the car so we can see itbetter but i decided to just keep going because there was no place to pull over.This is what i saw i saw this spider-like type of aircraft. thats the best wayto describe it. it had just a little body on the top like a spider has and ithad what looked like thin legs coming down and each leg had some lightsconnected to the leg. i can draw it out for you if youd like. brian saw the samething too. i just called him earlier to verify what he saw and he said exactlywhat i wrote. he also added something that i didnt see. he saw what looked likea kite top. i guess i was a little to excited to see it that i didnt pay muchattention. i was just in shock that i saw this. feel free to get in touch withme through e-mail and me and brian will try to answer any of your questions.Thank you,raul felician    xkillaklownx@lycos.Com
content.summary: Saw a spider-like type of aircraft
